parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel pump flange connection can cause a fuel leak, which can lead to a fire hazard and a direct life safety issue.
symptoms: Fuel leak from the fuel pump flange connection
fuel dripping onto the exhaust manifold

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel level sensor can cause the fuel gauge to display an incorrect reading, leading to a sudden loss of power and increasing the risk of a crash.
The failure of the plastic throttle-body pulley can cause a loss of power and increase the risk of a crash.
symptoms: sudden failure of the throttle-body pulley

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel level sensor strip can cause the fuel gauge to malfunction, leading to inaccurate fuel level readings, which can result in the motorcycle suddenly running out of fuel while in motion, posing a safety risk to the rider.
symptoms: The fuel gauge shows false or inconsistent readings
the fuel gauge shows a sudden drop in fuel level
the fuel gauge shows a full tank when the tank is almost empty
the fuel gauge shows an empty tank when there are several gallons of fuel left.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive system can cause the rear wheel to wobble or drift unexpectedly, leading to loss of control and potential accidents. It can also result in costly repairs, potentially exceeding $2,500.
symptoms: Extreme wobble on the back wheel
black oil all over the back rim and wheel
metallic particles in the drivetrain oil.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Ball Bearing Failure in Final Drive Assembly
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the ball bearing in the final drive assembly can cause the rear wheel to drift unexpectedly and move sideways, leading to loss of control and potential accidents.
symptoms: Rear tire begins to drift unexpectedly and move sideways

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the final drive crown bearing can cause vibration in the drive train, leading to potential accidents and costly repairs.
